item.title: Emote help
item.dc:creator: @Jonna Jonna
item.description:
@Jonna wrote:

How do i change the name of emotes? ive changed them all expect for laugh and on wards how do i change these?

case 170: // Admin tele if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 2529; teleportToY = 3494; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Theres code, it shold say Admin, but it says laugh.

Read full topic
